name: BMT_DONOR_EPISODE_LINKS
description: Contains linkages from the Blood and Marrow Transplant recipient's episode to their donors' episodes.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BMT_DONOR_EPSD_ID
columns.description: Link between the recipient blood and marrow transplant episode and the donor blood and marrow transplant episode.
